content:
Uber Files whistleblower Mark MacGann today accused the ridesharing
company of “co-opting democracy” as he appealed to European
lawmakers to reclassify the platform’s workers as employees in
order to guarantee their rights.

The career lobbyist turned whistleblower told a parliamentary
committee that Uber had misled the world about the benefits of the
gig economy, paid academics to skew findings, swamped markets and
“weaponized” drivers and customers in its own interests against
elected officials.


www.icij.org/investi...arliament/
author: crt

content:
... Ali bi država dobila več prispevkov, če bi bili dostavljavci
hrane redno zaposleni? Ne. ...

... holy shit ! ... evo, sicer v svojem članku ni nič napisal,
mogoče pa direktor Wolt Slovenija Clemens Brugger sam ne dela zato,
da bi s svojim delom izpolnil svoje osebne cilje in tako preživel
sebe in - če jo ima - svojo družino, ampak direktor Wolt Slovenija
Clemens Brugger dela zato, da bi državi plačal čimveč prispevkov
... eh, jebiga ...

P.S.: ne morem verjet, kakšen propagandistični bulšit lahko
preberem na Financah, ampak tudi v tem je čar Financ ...
author: najobj
